name: London's Biggest MBA Event - QS World MBA Tour
content: Are you looking to take your career or startup to the next level? If so then we have just what you're looking for! QS returns to London on 10th March with it's world renowned MBA Fair - QS World MBA Tour. Here you will get the chance to interact exclusively with admissions dircetors from over 40+ of the world's leading business schools and find your ideal MBA program. This years exhibitors include Manchester, Copenhagen, ESADE, HEC-Paris, IE, Imperial, LBS, SMU, Sydney, Oxford-Saïd and many more... On the day you will also have the chance to attend informative seminars on application procedures & how to ace the GMAT as well as getting a free expert CV evaluation at our exclusive CV Clinic. By attending, you will also gain access to a pool of scholarships worth up to $7M, get a free copy of the QS TopMBA Career Guide and recieve application fee waivers from select B-Schools. VOUCHER GIVEAWAY: Once you sign up to our event for free, click 'Going' on our Facebook event page: London MBA Event - QS World MBA Tour. You will then be able to collect a free £5 starbucks voucher on the day! Register now for free to reserve your place. If you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact us at uk@qs.com. We look forward to seeing you there! Team QS Price: FREE TICKET: GBP 0 Time: 1:30 pm to 6:00 pm Venue details: Queen Elizabeth II Centre, Broad Sanctuary, Westminster, London, SW1P 3EE, United Kingdom
